Calculate soil N2O emissions

Source: R/calc_emissions_soil.R
calc_emissions_soil.Rd

Estimates direct and indirect N2O emissions from soils due to fertilization, excreta deposition, and crop residues using IPCC methodology.

calc_emissions_soil(
  n_fertilizer_synthetic = 0,
  n_fertilizer_organic = 0,
  n_excreta_pasture = 0,
  n_crop_residues = 0,
  area_ha = NULL,
  soil_type = "well_drained",
  climate = "temperate",
  ef_direct = NULL,
  include_indirect = TRUE,
  gwp_n2o = 273,
  boundaries = NULL
)

Arguments

n_fertilizer_synthetic

Numeric. Synthetic nitrogen fertilizer applied (kg N/year). Default = 0.

n_fertilizer_organic

Numeric. Organic nitrogen fertilizer applied (kg N/year). Default = 0.

n_excreta_pasture

Numeric. Nitrogen excreted directly on pasture (kg N/year). Default = 0.

n_crop_residues

Numeric. Nitrogen in crop residues returned to soil (kg N/year). Default = 0.

area_ha

Numeric. Total farm area (hectares). Used for calculating per-hectare metrics.

soil_type

Character. Soil drainage characteristics. Options: "well_drained", "poorly_drained". Default = "well_drained". Affects emission factors.

climate

Character. Climate classification. Options: "temperate", "tropical". Default = "temperate". Affects emission factors.

ef_direct

Numeric. Direct emission factor for N2O-N (kg N2O-N/kg N input). If NULL, uses IPCC 2019 values adjusted by soil type and climate.

include_indirect

Logical. Include indirect N2O emissions from volatilization and leaching? Default = TRUE.

gwp_n2o

Numeric. Global Warming Potential of N2O. Default = 273 (IPCC AR6).

boundaries

Optional. An object from set_system_boundaries(). If "soil" is not included, returns 0.

Value

A list with detailed N2O emissions by source, direct/indirect components, and metadata following IDF methodology.

Examples

# Basic calculation with synthetic fertilizer
calc_emissions_soil(n_fertilizer_synthetic = 1500, area_ha = 100)
#> $source
#> [1] "soil"
#> 
#> $soil_conditions
#> $soil_conditions$soil_type
#> [1] "well_drained"
#> 
#> $soil_conditions$climate
#> [1] "temperate"
#> 
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs
#> $nitrogen_inputs$synthetic_fertilizer_kg_n
#> [1] 1500
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$organic_fertilizer_kg_n
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$excreta_pasture_kg_n
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$crop_residues_kg_n
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$total_kg_n
#> [1] 1500
#> 
#> 
#> $emissions_breakdown
#> $emissions_breakdown$direct_n2o_kg
#> [1] 23.571
#> 
#> $emissions_breakdown$indirect_volatilization_n2o_kg
#> [1] 2.357
#> 
#> $emissions_breakdown$indirect_leaching_n2o_kg
#> [1] 5.304
#> 
#> $emissions_breakdown$total_indirect_n2o_kg
#> [1] 7.661
#> 
#> $emissions_breakdown$total_n2o_kg
#> [1] 31.232
#> 
#> 
#> $co2eq_kg
#> [1] 8526.38
#> 
#> $emission_factors
#> $emission_factors$ef_direct
#> [1] 0.01
#> 
#> $emission_factors$ef_volatilization
#> [1] 0.01
#> 
#> $emission_factors$ef_leaching
#> [1] 0.0075
#> 
#> $emission_factors$gwp_n2o
#> [1] 273
#> 
#> $emission_factors$factors_source
#> [1] "User-provided"
#> 
#> 
#> $methodology
#> [1] "IPCC 2019 Tier 1 (direct + indirect)"
#> 
#> $standards
#> [1] "IPCC 2019 Refinement, IDF 2022"
#> 
#> $date
#> [1] "2025-09-04"
#> 
#> $per_hectare_metrics
#> $per_hectare_metrics$n_input_kg_per_ha
#> [1] 15
#> 
#> $per_hectare_metrics$n2o_kg_per_ha
#> [1] 0.312
#> 
#> $per_hectare_metrics$co2eq_kg_per_ha
#> [1] 85.26
#> 
#> $per_hectare_metrics$emission_intensity_kg_co2eq_per_kg_n
#> [1] 5.68
#> 
#> 
#> $source_contributions
#> $source_contributions$synthetic_fertilizer_pct
#> [1] 100
#> 
#> $source_contributions$organic_fertilizer_pct
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $source_contributions$excreta_pasture_pct
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $source_contributions$crop_residues_pct
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $source_contributions$direct_emissions_pct
#> [1] 75.5
#> 
#> $source_contributions$indirect_emissions_pct
#> [1] 24.5
#> 
#> 

# Mixed system with fertilizer and grazing
calc_emissions_soil(
  n_fertilizer_synthetic = 800,
  n_fertilizer_organic = 200,
  n_excreta_pasture = 3000,
  area_ha = 150
)
#> $source
#> [1] "soil"
#> 
#> $soil_conditions
#> $soil_conditions$soil_type
#> [1] "well_drained"
#> 
#> $soil_conditions$climate
#> [1] "temperate"
#> 
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs
#> $nitrogen_inputs$synthetic_fertilizer_kg_n
#> [1] 800
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$organic_fertilizer_kg_n
#> [1] 200
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$excreta_pasture_kg_n
#> [1] 3000
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$crop_residues_kg_n
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$total_kg_n
#> [1] 4000
#> 
#> 
#> $emissions_breakdown

#> [1] 62.857
#> 
#> $emissions_breakdown$indirect_volatilization_n2o_kg

#>

#> 
#> $emissions_breakdown$total_indirect_n2o_kg
#> [1] 25.457
#> 
#> $emissions_breakdown$total_n2o_kg
#> [1] 88.314
#> 
#> 
#> $co2eq_kg
#> [1] 24109.8
#> 
#> $emission_factors
#> $emission_factors$ef_direct
#> [1] 0.01

#>

#> [1] 160.73
#>

#> [1] 6.03
#>

#> [1] 5
#> 
#> $source_contributions$excreta_pasture_pct
#> [1] 75
#> 
#> $source_contributions$crop_residues_pct
#> [1] 0
#>

#> 
#> $source_contributions$indirect_emissions_pct
#> [1] 28.8

# Tropical poorly-drained conditions
calc_emissions_soil(
  n_fertilizer_synthetic = 1200,
  soil_type = "poorly_drained",
  climate = "tropical",
  area_ha = 80
)
#> $source
#> [1] "soil"
#> 
#> $soil_conditions
#> $soil_conditions$soil_type

#>

#> [1] "tropical"
#> 
#>

# Without indirect emissions
calc_emissions_soil(
  n_fertilizer_synthetic = 1000,
  include_indirect = FALSE,
  area_ha = 120
)

#>

#> [1] 0
#>

#> [1] 0
#>

#> [1] 100
#> 
#> $source_contributions$indirect_emissions_pct
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> 

# With system boundaries
b <- set_system_boundaries("farm_gate")
calc_emissions_soil(n_fertilizer_synthetic = 1500, boundaries = b, area_ha = 100)
#> $source
#> [1] "soil"
#> 
#> $soil_conditions
#> $soil_conditions$soil_type
#> [1] "well_drained"
#> 
#> $soil_conditions$climate
#> [1] "temperate"
#> 
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs
#> $nitrogen_inputs$synthetic_fertilizer_kg_n
#> [1] 1500
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$organic_fertilizer_kg_n
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$excreta_pasture_kg_n
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$crop_residues_kg_n
#> [1] 0
#> 
#> $nitrogen_inputs$total_kg_n
#> [1] 1500
#>
